description: The file 'omi_main.cpp' is the main source file for a C++ project related to the OMI (Open Management Infrastructure). It contains the main function, initializes logging, sets up signal handling for graceful shutdown, and runs a service object.

classes.name: OmiService
classes.description: A class representing the core service that is initialized and run in the main function.

methods.name: int main()
methods.description: The entry point for the application, responsible for initializing the logging system, setting up signal handling for SIGTERM, running the service, and logging exit information.
